scripts.postbuild:electron:mas: bash -c 'APP=$(node scripts/mas/paths-electron.js) && PROFILE=$(node scripts/mas/detect-electron-profile.js) && bash scripts/mas/embed-electron-profiles.sh "$APP" "$PROFILE" && bash scripts/mas/resign-electron-mas.sh "$APP"'
